thread.title: Caution: There will be tears (23 Photos)
thread.title_full: Caution: There will be tears (23 Photos)

author: Hendy
title: Caution: There will be tears (23 Photos)
text:
A man hugs his dog after finding her in an abandoned home during the 2013 Alabama tornado. 22 
A woman receives a basket gift from her husband who had passed away. 23 source 
“My 38 year old girlfriend just started her second quarter of college. She’s raised two kids, 15 and 10, on her own, has piss all parents and was the victim in not one but two domestic violence cases. This is how I found her tonight. I’m so proud of this woman I could burst. We went wedding ring shopping earlier today and I think I’m ready to make the best decision of my life.” 24
